channel.title: Server Worlds
channel.description:
Is it possible to have 2 different worlds that load different scripts?
Atm I have 2 worlds but I would like to change one of them to be a pking world(All teles and shops pk based) and then the other world a skilling world (All teles and shops skilling based). Is this possible? Or can I only do one script for both worlds?

item.title: Server Worlds
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

… I don’t want everything fucking floating in world 2…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Worlds
item.dc:creator: @Radiationscape Radiationscape
item.description:
@Radiationscape wrote:

easy, if your normal world is heightlvl=0

then make all npcs and shops for ur pk world go to the hight lvl of ur second world

Read full topic
